title: Apple Magic Mouse Review (2015)
description:
This is a review of the Apple Magic Mouse. It's not the most comfortable mouse on the market, but in terms of functionality, I don't regret this purchase for a second. It'll cost you about $69.00 at the Apple Store. Link below:

http://store.apple.com/us/product/MB829LL/A/apple-magic-mouse


Please, if you liked the video, be sure to thumbs up, comment to let  me know what you think, and subscribe to see more unboxings and reviews!

asset.author: ColbysTechReviews
